item.title: Vashon’s second radio repeater nears fruition!
item.description: Congrats to the variety of people (but especially Randall Bardwell with assistance by Tim Hardy) for huge new progress on getting a second repeater up and (soon) operational for Vashon’s amateur radio community. While it will be able to serve as a backup to the existing W7VMI club repeater, it also is vastly more modern with a super flexible architecture that will allow a much broader array of services and modes in the future. This likely will play a role in enhancing emergency communications in coming years.

item.title: Vashon Island Fire & Rescue Celebrates 70 Years with an Open House Oct. 13th
